report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27588 QNAP QVR Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27588 QNAP QVR Vulnerability
text: QNAP QVR could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an unspecified flaw. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system.
